name: Doggo Dash
description:
SAVE THE STRAYS!

Dog owners seem to be losing their dogs and signs have gone up all around town. You find the dogs at a hidden park.

Explore the park throughout the day and use your high-tech treat gun to feed dogs so that they'll trust you. But beware of dog-nappers as they'll try to steal the dogs away from you! Stun them with your gun to buy some time and run away. 

Protect the dogs from the dog-nappers but beware not to raise suspicion. Too much noise and you'll attract unwanted attention.

The shelter will keep the dogs warm and safe. Guide them there and earn rewards for your time and effort. After all, nothing's better than being loved by a bunch of dogs!

**Highly recommend you go through the tutorial in the menu screen!**

Credits: Thomas Nguyen (Artist), Julia Gu (UI/UX Design), Giovanny Castillo (Programmer)
